game.name: Life in Jasskia: a Coffee Shop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Shop Survivor Simulator. In the crisis-ridden country of Jasskia, building a café is easy. Keeping it alive? That’s another story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Shop Survivor Simulator. In the crisis-ridden country of Jasskia, building a café is easy. Keeping it alive? That’s another story.
